summary: This document is an email correspondence involving Jes Staley, Andrew MacFadyen, and Alexa N. Staley discussing academic research in computational astrophysics. Alexa expresses her interest in pursuing a PhD at NYU and shares her research experience, while Andrew provides insights into his work and encourages her application.

persons.name: Jes Staley
persons.context: Jes Staley is the sender of the email forwarding the conversation.

persons.name: Andrew MacFadyen
persons.context: Andrew MacFadyen is a professor at NYU who discusses his research in computational astrophysics and responds to Alexa's inquiry.

persons.name: Alexa N. Staley
persons.context: Alexa N. Staley is a senior at Bowdoin College interested in pursuing a PhD in physics and is communicating with Andrew about her research and application.

connections.description: Jes Staley appears to be a family member of Alexa N. Staley, as indicated by the informal nature of the email.
Andrew MacFadyen is a professor who is providing guidance and encouragement to Alexa regarding her academic pursuits.

keyFacts: Jes Staley forwards an email conversation regarding academic research.
Alexa N. Staley is interested in pursuing a PhD in physics and has conducted research in numerical relativity.
Andrew MacFadyen discusses his research in computational astrophysics and encourages Alexa's application to NYU.
The email mentions advanced LIGO, which is expected to detect astronomical events starting in 2014.
Andrew MacFadyen is on sabbatical at Harvard for the upcoming semester.
